data.title: Centerville, UT
data.meta_description: Discover information and resources for local residents.
data.text:
About Centerville

Although Centerville City is conveniently located in the middle of one of the nation's fastest growing regions, Centerville has retained a small town atmosphere and similar quality of life.

Animal Control - Davis County

Animal Care of Davis County is committed to providing great service to residents and compassionate care to animals, working tirelessly to support public safety, find homes for homeless animals and educate the community about responsible pet ownership.

Centerville Community Foundation

The purpose of the Centerville Community Foundation is to carry out charitable purposes and provide improved services for citizens and neighborhoods.

CodeRED

Sign up to receive local emergency alerts and updates from the City through CodeRED.

Community Events

Community News

Read current news and announcements.

COVID-19 Updates

Have a look at some COVID-19 related updates and information from Centerville and Davis County.

Domestic Violence Help

Utah Valley University has put together a series of excellent videos dealing with domestic violence. Take a moment to review these videos and learn more about how to get help

Elections

Historic District & Walking Tour

Learn more about nationally registered historic buildings, historic districts, and the Utah Heritage Walk of Centerville's original town site.

Newsletters

Citizens of Centerville City should receive a newsletter via the regular mail and utility inserts with their utility bill; for your convenience we have also provided electronic copies of the newsletters and utility inserts.

Online Payments

Discover how you can pay your Centerville utility bills or tickets/fines online.

Social Media

Stay up to date with Centerville by checking out the City's social media accounts.

Volunteer Opportunities

There are several opportunities for you to get involved in your community, so have a look at the volunteer form to find out more about how you can take part.
